SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractGenController
This abstract class serves as the foundation for key generation controllers within the application.
AbstractSignatureBaseController
This abstract class is part of the controller component specific to digital signature operations responsible for handling user interactions for the signature process.
AbstractSignatureBaseController.TriConsumer<T,U,V>
Functional interface for a consumer that accepts three arguments.
AbstractSignatureBaseControllerBenchmarking
This abstract class provides a skeleton for specific benchmarking controllers to build upon, ensuring a consistent approach across different aspects of signature benchmarking while allowing flexibility for specialised implementations.
AbstractSignatureBaseControllerBenchmarking.TriConsumer<T,U,V>
The TriConsumer interface represents an operation that accepts three input arguments and returns no result.
AbstractSignatureModelBenchmarking
This class is part of the Model component specific to digital signature operations providing methods to sign data and verify signatures.
BenchmarkingContext
This abstract class that provides a framework for specialised functionality within the results module related to signature operations that have been benchmarked.
BenchmarkingUtility
This class provides helper methods for facilitating statistical analysis of time measurements and launching/managing benchmarking tasks.
ByteArrayConverter
Provides utility methods for converting BigInteger to fixed-length byte arrays, commonly used in cryptographic operations.
DigestFactory
The DigestFactory class provides a method to create MessageDigest instances based on a given DigestType.
DigestType
Enum representing the various cryptographic hash functions supported in the digital signature schemes.
DisplayUtility
A utility class that provides static methods for common display operations such as showing alerts, copying text to clipboard, and handling file imports within the application.
FileHandle
Utility class for file handling, providing functionality to import from and export to files.
GenControllerBenchmarking
This class extends the AbstractGenController to implement functionality specific to the benchmarking mode of operation.
GenControllerComparisonBenchmarking
This class extends the GenControllerBenchmarking to specialise in handling key generation for comparison benchmarking scenarios.
GenControllerCustomComparisonBenchmarking
This class extends the GenControllerComparisonBenchmarking to specialise in handling key generation for custom comparison benchmarking scenarios.
GenControllerStandard
Controller class for the key generation view in the digital signature application.
GenModel
This class is part of the Model component specific to the RSA key generation module in the application, handling the data and logic associated with RSA key generation.
GenModelBenchmarking
This class, extending GenModel, is specifically designed for RSA key generation in benchmarking mode.
GenModelComparisonBenchmarking
This class extends the GenModelBenchmarking class to specialise in comparison benchmarking scenarios.
GenRSA
The GenRSA class is responsible for generating RSA key pairs.
GenView
The domain object corresponding to GenView FXML file that will serve as a controllers interface into observing and manipulating the graphical layout of the view.
GraphManager
Manages the generation and display of graphical representations of benchmarking results in RSA cryptography.
HashFunctionItem
Represents an item in the hash function selection list within the RSA key generation view.
HashFunctionSelection
Represents a selection of a hash function along with its properties.
Key
This abstract class provides a foundational representation of an RSA key, encapsulating common attributes and behaviors such as parsing, storing, and retrieving a key or its components.
KeyConfigurationsDialog
 
KeyGenerationContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of key generation operations.
KeyGenerationMediator
This class acts as an intermediary between the main controller of the application and the key generation controller assembly.
KeyGenUtil
Utility class providing methods for operations related to key generation processes.
KeyPair
This class represents a pair of associated cryptographic keys that are generated together and mathematically related: a public key and a private key.
LaunchMainMenu
Entry point for a JavaFX application that initializes and displays the main menu.
MainController
This class serves as the central controller for the application, managing navigation between different views and coordinating actions across the entire program.
MainMenuView
The MainMenuView class is responsible for managing the user interface related to the navigation portal of the Signature Scheme POC application.
MGF1
This class implements the Mask Generation Function 1 (MGF1), a method used for transforming a cryptographic hash function to generate outputs of a desired size i.e., a mask.
PrivateKey
This class represents the private key derived from an RSA key pair.
PublicKey
This class represents the public key derived from an RSA key pair.
ResultsBaseController
This class serves as an abstract base for controllers managing the display/interaction logic in the benchmarking application and is designed to accommodate various benchmarking scenarios, including standard and comparison benchmarking modes.
ResultsControllerComparisonBenchmarking
This class manages the results display and interaction logic for the digital signature benchmarking application.
ResultsControllerNormalBenchmarking
This class manages the results display and interaction logic for the digital signature benchmarking application in standard benchmarking mode based solely on the results ordered by single keys.
ResultsModel
The ResultsModel class stores and calculates various statistical metrics based on a specified set of results gathered from a benchmarking run for a core digital signature operation.
ResultsTableColumn
The ResultsTableColumn class represents a column in the results table.
ResultsUtility
Provides utility functions to support the handling and processing of benchmarking results.
ResultsView
The ResultsView class is responsible for displaying the statistical results of the benchmarking process in the digital signature application.
RunApplication
This class serves as the entry point to launch the main menu of the application.
SignatureBaseContext
SignatureBaseContext serves as an abstract base class for contexts associated with signature operations for the benchmarking results module.
SignatureBaseView
This class serves as the abstract base class for all views related to the signature processes (generation and verification).
SignatureCreationContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of signature creation operations.
SignatureFactory
Factory class for creating instances of various signature schemes.
SignatureMediator
This class acts as an intermediary between the main controller of the application and various signature controllers.
SignatureModel
This class is part of the Model component specific to digital signature operations providing methods to sign data and verify signatures.
SignatureModelBenchmarking
This class is part of the Model component specific to digital signature operations providing methods to sign batches of data and verification of batch signatures.
SignatureModelComparisonBenchmarking
This class is part of the Model component specific to digital signature operations providing methods to sign data and verify signatures.
SignatureType
This Enum represents the full suite of deterministic and standardised RSA digital signature schemes.
SignatureVerificationContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of signature verification operations.
SignView
The SignView class is responsible for managing the user interface related to the signing process in the Signature Scheme application.
SigScheme
This abstract class provides a specialised framework for implementing a signature scheme using the RSA algorithm.
SigSchemeInterface
This interface defines the essential functionalities of a signature scheme.
StatisticData
The StatisticData class represents a single statistic, including its name and value, for display in the results view.
VerifyView
The VerifyView class is responsible for managing the user interface related to the verification process in the Signature Scheme application.
